backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataRowEvenBackgroundColor.comment: The primary color to use as the background for data rows expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataRowEvenTextColor.comment: The color of the text for data rows on primary color background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataRowOddBackgroundColor.comment: The alternate color to use as the background for data rows expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataRowOddTextColor.comment: The color of the text for data rows on alternate color background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
nodes.comment: Node definitions for which messages will be reported

nodes._config_summary.comment: A brief description of this item for nodeyez-config app
nodes.enabled.comment: Indicates whether this node definition is enabled for reporting. If set to false, it will be skipped
nodes.profileName.comment: The name of the profile as defined in LND Settings
nodes.headerText.comment: Override the text to use in the header area for this node

renderMode.comment: The format to render the messages

renderMode.choices.fixedheight: Messages have a fixed height based on pageSize
renderMode.choices.proportional: Messages have a proportional height based on text of the message (default)

renderNewestFirst.comment: If set to true, list messages in reverse chronological order
restrictToDaysAgo.comment: The number of days ago for which messages should be rendered, ignoring messages from prior. A value of 0 reports all messages
pageSize.comment: The number of messages to represent per page rendered
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
